titles.title: Providing for consideration of the joint resolution (S.J. Res. 33) joint resolution relating to increasing the debt limit.
Providing for consideration of the joint resolution (S.J. Res. 33) joint resolution relating to increasing the debt limit.

action.text: The House Committee on Rules reported an original measure, H. Rept. 117-219, by Mr. Morelle.
Providing for consideration of S.J. Res. 33. Provides for one hour of debate, the previous question shall be considered as ordered without intervening motions, and provides for a motion to commit.

calendar.text: Placed on the House Calendar, Calendar No. 59.

action.text: DEBATE - The House proceeded with one hour of debate on H. Res. 852.
On ordering the previous question Agreed to by the Yeas and Nays: 220 - 212 (Roll no. 445).

vote.text: On agreeing to the resolution Agreed to by the Yeas and Nays: 220 - 212 (Roll no. 446).

action.text: Motion to reconsider laid on the table Agreed to without objection.

bill.summary: This resolution provides for consideration of S.J.Res. 33 (increasing the public debt limit by $2.5 trillion).
